content: President Obama's only course of action right now is to engage in emotional and mental warfare, if you will, on the American people. By giving thunderous speeches, having brunch with the queen of England, and completing an NCAA mens basketball bracket he is giving the impression that, "All is well." Thats it, They are just hoping and praying they can get people confident enough not to collapse the economy. They are doing nothing to fix the fundamental problems with the financial sector, nothing. Credit markets still remain frozen, unemployment continues to rise, but hey my President picked the NCAA Mens basketball champion...
